text: And David came from 5. 20 Heb. Baal-perazim.Upper Breaches, and smote the Philistines there: and David said, The Lord has destroyed the hostile Philistines before me, as water is dispersed; therefore the name of that place was called 5. 20 Thus in English or other languages, Underskiddaw, Unterseen, etc.Over Breaches.
